name: Dockup
headline: On demand ephemeral environments to run manual and automated tests.
description: Dockup gives on-demand environments for engineering teams so they can merge pull requests with confidence. It works like CircleCI, but allows you to manually test and see each code changes in action with your entire tech stack without having to mock any of your services.

founders.name: Emil Soman, Founder
founders.description: Talk to me about devtools, ecommerce, gaming

[Sign up for free](https://getdockup.com/<https:/dockup.typeform.com/to/HMkykf>)
#  The easiest way to set up and manage deployments on AWS 
If you hate wasting your time on a dozen devops tutorials just to set up your deployments, Dockup is for you. 
![](https://getdockup.com/images/Vector-070ae1f732baa38f3b147d7cd5925100.png?vsn=d)
##  How it works 
  * Sign up and connect your Github and AWS accounts
  * Behind the scenes, Dockup automatically creates these AWS resources for your deployments: 
    * **CodeBuild** pulls your source code from Github and builds Docker images.
    * **ECR** stores the Docker images.
    * **EKS** runs the Docker images as containers.
    * **IAM** permissions for users and AWS resources.
    * **VPCs, subnets and forwarding rules** for networking rules for your AWS resources.
    * **Security groups** to lock down your network.
  * Push to Github to deploy code.
  * For deployment checklists, manual deployments or rollbacks, use Dockup UI.


## Free forever
![](https://getdockup.com/images/padlock-24eb750732f338c99fa8dcc7e17efc7d.svg?vsn=d)
### Your infrastructure, no lock-in
Dockup uses your cloud infrastructure for deployments and can eject itself on your command.
![](https://getdockup.com/images/unicast-8d2620e906d3a1cff383ff982d5fec37.svg?vsn=d)
### Auto scaling and load balancing
Dockup automatically adds and removes nodes to accommodate varying loads on your applications.
![](https://getdockup.com/images/launch-8057ba798975a5e80aeb0101f51c7ff5.svg?vsn=d)
### Rolling deployments
Dockup deploys your services incrementally with zero downtime
![](https://getdockup.com/images/ssl-03b3e525d6d1d3822be8ef577791cb1f.svg?vsn=d)
### SSL
Dockup automatically provisions and renews SSL certificates.
##  Dockup for teams 
$45 monthly, unlimited users
Teams and projects
Role based access control
Custom deployment checklists
Reporting and analytics
[Sign up for free](https://getdockup.com/<https:/dockup.typeform.com/to/HMkykf>)

generated_description:
### Dockup Overview

Dockup is a proactive solution tailored for engineering teams that need to navigate the complexities of manual and automated testing with confidence. By providing on-demand ephemeral environments, Dockup allows developers to test their code in real-time without the hassle of mock services. It’s akin to what CircleCI offers but with the added benefit of visualizing every code change within the entire tech stack, ensuring that pulls to the main branch are as seamless and reliable as possible.

### Evolution and Mission

Founded in Y Combinator's W19 batch, Dockup started with a clear mission: "On-demand ephemeral environments to run manual and automated tests." Nestled in Mountain View, California, and manned by a dedicated team of just four employees, Dockup has its sights set on simplifying the deployment process. They target developers who are fed up with sifting through convoluted DevOps tutorials and just want a practical solution.

### How Dockup Works

**Setup Process:**
1. Sign up and connect your GitHub and AWS accounts.
2. Dockup autonomously creates the necessary AWS resources for your deployments:
   - **CodeBuild** pulls your source code and builds Docker images.
   - **ECR** stores those images.
   - **EKS** runs them as containers.
   - **IAM** manages user and resource permissions.
   - Network configurations are automatically taken care of with VPCs, subnets, and security groups.

Once set up, deploying code is as easy as pushing to GitHub. You can manage deployment checklists, conduct manual deployments, or perform rollbacks through a user-friendly interface.

### Key Features

- **Free Forever**: Dockup doesn’t lock you in; it utilizes your infrastructure for deployments but can be easily unlinked whenever you need.
- **Auto Scaling and Load Balancing**: The platform dynamically adjusts to traffic patterns, adding or removing nodes as necessary.
- **Rolling Deployments**: Deploy new versions of services incrementally, ensuring zero downtime during updates.
- **SSL Management**: Automatically provisions and renews SSL certificates, taking one more task off your plate.

### Pricing

For teams, Dockup offers an attractive pricing model at $45 monthly, which includes unlimited users, role-based access control, custom deployment checklists, and comprehensive reporting and analytics.

If you're looking to streamline your deployment process with a simple yet powerful tool, Dockup is designed to tackle those challenges head-on, letting you focus on what you do best: building great software.

For more information, check out their website [here](https://getdockup.com/).
